殢字的基本解释

殢
tì
滞留：“进乏梯媒退又难，强随豪贵殢长安。”
纠缠：“要索新词，殢人含笑立尊前。”
困于；沉溺于：“犹自殢于酒色而不思讨贼。”

殢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tì］
［《廣韻》他計切，去霽，透。］
［《廣韻》呼計切，去霽，曉。］
(1)极；穷尽。
(2)滞留。
(3)指呆滞。
(4)困扰；纠缠。
(5)迷恋；沉湎。

殢字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【歹字部】　殢； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页582第37
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?他計切，音替。【玉篇】極困也。　又【玉篇】【集韻】?大計切，音弟。義同。　又【廣韻】呼計切，音㰥。義同。　【集韻】與?同。互見?字註。

殢字的源字形

殢字的起名意思

暂无。

wearily
Basic explanation of words
wearily
tì
Stay: "It's difficult to enter the ladder and retreat, and it is difficult to follow the rich and expensive to Chang'an."
Entanglement: "If you want to ask for new words, you will stand before you with a smile."
Trapped in; indulged in: "I'm still dying of wine without thinking about begging for thief."
wearily
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tì］
["Guangyun" he planned to cut, go to Ji, and thoroughly. ]
["Guangyun" call for the cut, go to Ji, Xiao. ]
(1) Extremely; exhaustive.
(2) Stay.
(3) Refers to sluggishness.
(4) Distress; entanglement.
(5) Infatuated; indulged.
